name: @joystick.js/test
description: Isomorphic testing framework for the Joystick JavaScript framework.

scripts.canary:release: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && node canary.js
scripts.production:release: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build && node release.js
scripts.win:canary:release: SET NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && node canary.js
scripts.win:production:release: SET NODE_ENV=production && npm run build && node release.js
